mapper.select: select * from workout_kcal where user_idx=#{user_idx} order by w_regdate desc
select regdate, sum(w_unit_kcal) as total_sum from ( select *, substring(w_regdate,1,10) as regdate from workout_kcal ) w where user_idx=#{ user_idx } group by regdate order by regdate desc

select regdate, sum(w_unit_kcal) as total_sum from ( select *, substring(w_regdate,1,10) as regdate from workout_kcal ) w where user_idx=#{ user_idx} and regdate = #{ w_regdate } order by w_regdate desc

select ifnull(total_sum,0) from ( select regdate, sum(w_unit_kcal) as total_sum from ( select *, substring(w_regdate,1,10) as regdate from workout_kcal ) w where user_idx=#{ user_idx} and regdate = Date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') group by regdate ) t
